mapper.select: SELECT CMP_TAG.CMP_TAG_ID AS tagId, CMP_TAG.CMP_TAG_NAME AS tagName, CMP_CATEGORY.CMP_CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, CMP_CATEGORY.CMP_CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, CMP_TAG.CMP_SERIAL_NUMBER AS serialNumber FROM CMP_TAG, CMP_CATEGORY WHERE CMP_TAG.CMP_CATEGORY_ID = CMP_CATEGORY.CMP_CATEGORY_ID ORDER BY CMP_TAG.CMP_SERIAL_NUMBER ASC
